function onInit() super.onInit() local nodeActor = window.getDatabaseNode() DB.addHandler(DB.getPath(nodeActor, "abilities.athletics.score"), "onUpdate", onSourceUpdate) DB.addHandler(DB.getPath(nodeActor, "skilllist"), "onChildUpdate", onSourceUpdate) onSourceUpdate() end
function onClose() local nodeActor = window.getDatabaseNode() DB.removeHandler(DB.getPath(nodeActor, "abilities.athletics.score"), "onUpdate", onSourceUpdate) DB.removeHandler(DB.getPath(nodeActor, "skilllist"), "onChildUpdate", onSourceUpdate) end
function onSourceUpdate() local nodeActor = window.getDatabaseNode() local rActor = ActorManager.resolveActor(nodeActor) local nAthletics = ActorManager5E.getAbilityScore(rActor, "athletics") local nRunBonus = math.floor(ActorManager5E.getSkillRank(rActor, "run")/2) local nBaseSpeed = 4 local nSprintFactor = 4
-- Check for lowered base speed if nAthletics == 1 and nRunBonus == 0 then nBaseSpeed = 3 elseif nAthletics == 1 and nRunBonus > 0 then nBaseSpeed = 4 nRunBonus = nRunBonus -1 end
-- Set Base Speed DB.setValue(nodeActor, "speed.base", "number", nBaseSpeed)
-- Set Run Bonus DB.setValue(nodeActor, "speed.bonus", "number", nRunBonus)
-- Set calculated value setValue(calculateSources()) end

function onWheel(notches) nState = self.getValue()
if notches > 0 then nState = nState + 1 elseif notches < 0 then nState = nState -1 end
if nState < 0 then nState = 0 elseif nState > 2 then nState = 2 end
self.setValue(nState) return true end

function onInit() super.onInit() DB.addHandler(DB.getPath(window.getDatabaseNode(), "speed.sprintfactor"), "onUpdate", onSourceUpdate) end
